Trade/Device Name(s): NOVA Lite DAPI dsDNA Crithidia luciliae Kit
NOVA Lite® DAPI dsDNA Crithidia luciliae Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NOVA Lite DAPI dsDNA Crithidia luciliae Kit, an indirect immunofluorescent assay for anti-dsDNA IgG antibodies in serum using manual and automated fluorescence microscopy.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative and/or semi-quantitative determination of anti-double stranded DNA (dsDNA) IgG antibodies in human serum to aid in the diagnosis of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), using manual or automated fluorescence microscopy, with results confirmed by a trained operator.
